azurerm_api_management_product_policy.description: Manages an API Management Product Policy

product_id.description: The ID of the API Management Product within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

xml_content.description: The XML Content for this Policy.

xml_link.description: A link to a Policy XML Document, which must be publicly available.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Product Policy.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Product Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Product Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Product Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Product Policy.
